content: colorful crocheted bolero with wavy stripes this garment is made all in one piece with the lower band added during finishing it is worked sideways from left cuff to right cuff instructions are written and include schematics **finished measurements** bust 30 34 length 13 1/2 including bottom band *note even though the actual bust measurement given seems small due to the dolman sleeves and the open front the fit of this garment is very forgiving * **materials** touché 50 grs/89 yards 3 4 hanks each #7914 lemon meringue a and #7970 nectar b and 2 3 hanks each #7930 green tea c and #7920 persimmon d crochet hook size 4 50 mm g or size to obtain gauge 1 st holder or safety pin **gauge** 1 pat st repeat = 4 6 row = 4 in crocheted pattern with a b c or d using size 4 50 mm g crochet hook
